channel.title: Suggestion
channel.description: Well, mod tharaok posted a thread about rep abuse in the 2nd page so that it is we can only rep a person 5-10 times in a month, but how about we make it so that people who have high rep like 100 dont give out 6 rep when they rep someone only 1 . for everyone it is 1 rep which will stop the abuse and people wont get as much rep.

item.title: Suggestion
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“moparsc4p3, post:6, topic:122999”][quote author=shadow235 link=topic=172736.msg1595612#msg1595612 date=1184389872]
I personally like the current rep system. I belive it only gets abused in the Moparscape area…People get their friends to rep them. But as MastrCheif just pointed out its just a number and shouldn’t even be talked about. No need to continue to discuss it…
[/quote]

Yes mastrcheif is rite[/quote]
And yes, your signature is leached.

Read full topic

item.title: Suggestion
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

moparsc4p3:

Well, mod tharaok posted a thread about rep abuse in the 2nd page so that it is we can only rep a person 5-10 times in a month, but how about we make it so that people who have high rep like 100 dont give out 6 rep when they rep someone only 1 . for everyone it is 1 rep which will stop the abuse and people wont get as much rep.

well repping 5-10 a month with 100 rep is the same as repping 40-50 times a month repping 1 each time -.- so your saying to take away the 5-10 times a month and replace it with 1 rep each time?

Read full topic
